file_insights.changes_summary: Added query history dropdown UI component with interactive features
modifications: Implemented dropdown with recent query list

patterns_discovered: Dropdown menu with outside click handling
Accessibility and interaction design in React
Local storage integration for query history
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring dropdown closes when clicking outside
Managing animation delays for list items
Performance considerations with multiple event listeners

key_achievements: Added dynamic styling with hover effects

recommendations: Consider extracting dropdown logic into a reusable component
Implement max history length to prevent performance issues
Add transition animations for smoother UX
